transcript_chunks.text: I'm gonna investigate it follow me in the background I'm gonna close these [ __ ] eyes forever no like a romantic oh my God that's a romantic I thought it was gonna be like a movie like this guy reminds me of my dad I'm taking a swing at the devil man oh no [ __ ] that guy no you need a 7-17 [ __ ] you Dad have been several attacks he's really pissed that's a work of the devil man that's what my dad used to do to me and my boys all the time look at the pier out of nowhere when we were smoking
